title: Game Freezing
body: I really need help !!! My league keeps freezing(black screen). I re-installed league of legends didn't work I also get these splats on my screen fill with color and it freezes and then resumes. Can someone please tell me is there a way to fix this ? It says that my graphics card has block league of legends from accessing graphics card. How do I un-block league?{{item:3089}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might have a combination of issues here.  The first piece is that your graphics driver may be failing or overheating.  This could be a hardware issue, but I recommend [updating your drivers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+#wq2) in case that's the culprit.  The other may be a permissions issue blocking the game from rendering.  For this, I recommend going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a fix.  Run those steps, and you should be good!
